Pre-Game Insights: The Bucks are the better defensive team and the Pacers have no answer for Giannis.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Giannis Antetokounmpo has missed the last two games with an illness and is listed as day-to-day.
Others: The Bucks (16-14) have dropped nine of their first 14 road games and trail Atlanta by a half-game for fifth place in the Eastern Conference standings.
The Indiana Pacers have won seven of their last ten games and are sitting in eighth place in the Eastern Conference standings.
The Pacers (16-17) rank tenth in the league in offensive efficiency and are averaging 114.7 points per game.
